question: Can't Log In?
answer: Important Note #1 When activating your NetID, it may take up to an hour to access services as your services need to be provisioned. When changing your password, it may take up to 30 minutes for your new password to work across Queen's services, including Microsoft 365/email, onQ, SOLUS and PeopleSoft.
